definitions.definition: An English person or person of English ancestry.
definitions.example: Back when we went to the World Cup in South Africa, we saw many anglos waving English flags.

definitions.definition: (sometimes offensive) an American, especially a white one (regardless of actual ethnicity), whose native language is English (as opposed to Americans for who have another native language).
definitions.example: I'm not an "anglo"; my grandparents are from Lithuania.

definitions.definition: An Anglo-Australian (as opposed to Australians of Mediterranean or Middle Eastern background).
A British person or person of British ancestry.
